In environment p : nat Hp : p <> 0 a, b : nat Unable to unify "p <> 0" with "Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq (Morphisms.respectful eq iff)) lt".

original: assert (H: rem b p = b). { apply rem_idem. apply div_rem_spec2. apply Hp. } rewrite H. rewrite Nat.add_mod_idemp_r. - reflexivity. - apply Hp.
